name: shadcn-svelte-themes
description: A collection of themed shadcn-svelte components with multiple style variants

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: A versatile button component with multiple variants, sizes, and states.

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: A flexible card container component with header, content, and footer sections.

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: A flexible input component with support for various types and states.

items.name: material-theme
items.title: Material Theme
items.description: Material Design inspired theme with rounded corners and vibrant colors

items.name: minimal-theme
items.title: Minimal Theme
items.description: Clean, minimal theme with subtle colors and sharp edges

items.name: corporate-theme
items.title: Corporate Theme
items.description: Professional corporate theme with conservative colors

items.name: twitter-theme
items.title: Twitter Theme
items.description: A theme inspired by Twitter's design with rounded corners and blue accents

items.name: bubblegum-theme
items.title: Bubblegum Theme
items.description: A playful theme with pink and pastel colors inspired by bubblegum

items.name: catppuccin-theme
items.title: Catppuccin Theme
items.description: A soothing pastel theme inspired by the popular Catppuccin color palette

items.name: graphite-theme
items.title: Graphite Theme
items.description: A sleek monochromatic theme with subtle grays and clean aesthetics
